name: Dungeon Battles
description:
This game is still in development, this is just an alpha, so many things will be improved and others might change.

Welcome to Dungeon Battles! In this game, you fight the Dungeon Battles with cards and dice rolls, to get money to buy new powerful cards to reach the top of the Dungeon Battles competition!

Please share your feedback and suggestions about the game in the comments and stay tuned for further updates!
